name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
“Battle Tripod” made by Beijing Enamel Factory

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
77 COVID-19 vaccine victims apply to Beijing Public Security Bureau for a parade
According to Weiquanwang, on June 21, 77 COVID-19 vaccine victims applied to the Beijing Public Security Bureau Security Brigade for a parade from the National Health Commission to the Ministry of Civil Affairs from 9:00 to 19:00 on July 2, 2024, based on the Constitution and the Law on Assembly, Parade and Demonstration. They called for the establishment of a COVID-19 vaccine injury relief and protection mechanism and a National Vaccine Injury Protection Law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 21, Dongguan, Guangdong. A sign with the words "Yasukuni Shrine" was hung on a public toilet at the Lotus Pond Impression scenic spot.
Later, it was suspected that someone reported it and the law enforcement officers ordered it to be removed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 24, in Changzhou, Jiangsu, Han Lu, a senior car reviewer, showed his son's second-year geography test paper. Most of the questions in the test paper were related to Huawei. Netizens responded: It's getting more and more like a "deification movement", but history tells us that in the end, deification creates a monster.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 23, Tianjin. A man wearing a red shirt with the word "China" printed on it climbed the clock of the last century and waved his hand like a great man. He was then taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens discovered that the "Income Tax Details" of the Personal Income Tax APP has added five items of personal income, namely business income; incidental income; interest; dividends; bonus income; property rental income; and property transfer income; in response to this, 12366 customer service stated that the five newly added personal income items are mainly for query and display purposes, and do not change the actual settlement method.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 22, disaster victims in Yanqian Town, Longyan City, Fujian Province waved national flags to bid farewell to the People's Liberation Army soldiers who had completed their disaster relief work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 23, Xianyang, Shaanxi. The Sunac Yuhe Chenyuan property was delayed in delivery, and the property management staff ran over with bricks and smashed them at the owners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 23, Suzhou, Jiangsu. It was reported online that a man in Unit 2, Building 19, Zhonghuayuan West Village was starved to death.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 23, Longyan, Fujian. Sandi Jinyu Yunjing real estate project was exposed as shoddy construction, and the developer reduced the specifications. The owners came to the sales office and held banners to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens have discovered that recently, mainstream media have begun to promote "foreign sons-in-law".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 23, economist Ren Zeping said:
In the past, when the economy was under pressure, we would cut taxes and fees and rest and recuperate. This is common sense in economics and the experience of countries around the world.
Taxes are not determined by investigations, but by development. As long as the economy is prosperous, taxes will naturally appear. (We should) go all out to develop the economy, let the water flow and raise fish, and put development as the top priority.
But as of now, the Weibo post has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 24, a fire broke out at a battery factory in Hwaseong, south of Seoul, South Korea, killing 18 Chinese workers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: Currently, even posting a screenshot of this passage will be restricted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Nanning Metro publicly praised an operations personnel manager for proposing eight scheduling optimization plans, exceeding the target of reducing staff by 401 people and saving 1.676 million yuan in overtime pay.
A blogger posted a video to complain, but was removed from the platform after being accused of leaking internal corporate information.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 23, She County, Anhui. A disaster victim posted a video saying that Zhiling Village has been without water, electricity and internet for three days. Due to damaged roads and bridges, rescue workers and supplies cannot enter the village. The elderly in the village can only save themselves and have no food.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many places have introduced policies to encourage rural residents to give up their rural homesteads and buy houses in cities. Among them, Fengyang County, Anhui Province, recently issued a new real estate policy, which clearly provides rewards for withdrawing from homesteads; Nantong City, Jiangsu Province, clearly stated that those who voluntarily withdraw (give up) rural homesteads and buy houses in cities will be given a certain amount of rewards and subsidies, and the specific standards are determined by the city itself.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 22 (Released) Henan. A man held a poster on the street to protest his rights. He said that he bought a house from Zhengshang Group, but 75 square meters of the 145 square meters house were shared, and hundreds of owners complained but could not win the lawsuit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Subsequent supplement: The second suspension statement released by the UP host was deleted again. The Douyin account was restricted on the grounds of "suspected violation of public order and good customs".
At the same time, the UP host said that it was no longer a complaint for deletion, but an invasion of reality.
He also said that he would not fight anymore, and all videos might be removed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 23, at the internship mobilization meeting of Sanxia Vocational and Technical College in Henan Province, students angrily criticized the teacher for the poor internship companies arranged by the school and forcing everyone to go. If they did not go, they would not be issued graduation certificates.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
CCTV-4 Cross-Strait 
May 24: The exercise is unprecedented, and landing on the island is just one step away. 
June 23: The United States sets a new trap to trick the mainland into attacking Taiwan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens complained under the Meizhou flood news: If he can't do it, he should leave immediately. This can't go on any longer.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 24, Guangxi. A cancer patient committed suicide by jumping into a river and left a note on the shore, which read: I am a cancer patient, please don't save me. Please help me call my daughter.
In the comment section, many family members of cancer patients talked about their own experiences of losing everything because of cancer.
